member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetDefaultIcon
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetFlags
member.param: Specifies return flags to get icon location.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetKey
member.summary: Sets the registry key from which to load the "DefaultIcon" value.
member.param: A handle to the registry key.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetNormalIcon
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetOpenIcon
member.summary: Sets the icon that allows containers to specify an "open" look.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit.SetShortcutIcon
member.summary: Sets the icon for a shortcut to the object.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the full icon path, including the file name and extension, as a Unicode string. This pointer can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDefaultExtractIconInit
member.summary: Exposes methods to set default icons associated with an object.
